casebody.data:
In re: Michelin North America, Inc. 171P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Alexander P. Sands, III, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, David S. Pokela, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Michelin North America, Inc. Ronald L. Gibson, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County. Kenneth R. Murphy, III, Attorney at Law, Allison Pope Cooper, Attorney at Law, Wilson, for Wake County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of May 2016 by Wake County for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
